definitions.definition: Any of a class of heterocyclic compounds containing pyrrole rings arranged in a square or other similar shape; they are important in biochemistry in a form with a metal atom in the central cavity ( hemoglobin with iron , chlorophyll with magnesium , etc.).

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any of a class of heterocyclic compounds containing pyrrole rings arranged in a square or other similar shape; they are important in biochemistry in a form with a metal atom in the central cavity ( hemoglobin with iron , chlorophyll with magnesium , etc.).
